text: 46|34|Arau yisakale kupharai karaiche yidina sihamtaka jahannamara sanmukhata upasthita karaa ha’ba (se'idina sihamtaka koraa ha’ba) ‘e'ito samca nahaya ne’? Sihamte ka’ba, ‘amara pratipalakara sapata! Niscaya samca’. Te'om ka’ba, ‘tente sasti bhoga karaa; karana tomaloke kupharai karaichila’.
